## AddressValue class

An address fed to or fetched from a Smart Contract contract, as an immutable abstraction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class AddressValue extends PrimitiveValue 
```
**Extends:** [PrimitiveValue](./sdk-core.primitivevalue.md)
